Name: Diana
description:
Diana is a young farmer who lives in Sapuyes, Nari√±o. She has been cultivating Capira Potato for more than 12 years, a skill she learned from her late father when she was very young. Diana currently has two hectares of crops which she staggers in different batches to guarantee yearlong sustainability.

Diana lives with her mother and sister in a terrain that was inherited from her father more than 15 years ago. She expects to save enough income to begin building her house by next year.

A loan of $2.526.380 COP helps Diana to acquire organic compost and fertilizers that will allow her to enhance her potato crops.
